item.title: Refactoring in vim - golang & graphql
item.description: Following will convert golang struct to a 99design graphql schema type. 1 2 3 4 5 6 type Post struct { UserID int `json:"userId"` ID int `json:"id"` Title string `json:"title"` Body string `json:"body"` } If you want to change case on selected lines you can use following. 1 :3,6s/`.*/ Above regular expression will remove the json tags from the line 3 to 6. 1 2 3 4 5 6 type Post struct { UserID int ID int Title string Body string } Next two steps are field name to camel case and data type to be capitalize.
